skills.name: Buster Blaze
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If this character has at least 7 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123041]</color> stacks, this DMG +1.\nAfter that, this character gains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123041]</color> stacks.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>. If this character has at least 7 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color> stacks, this DMG +1.\nAfter that, this character gains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color> stacks.
skills.description:
Deals 1 Pyro DMG. If this character has at least 7 Armored Crab Carapace stacks, this DMG +1.
After that, this character gains 2 Armored Crab Carapace stacks.

skills.name: Battle-Line Detonation
skills.descriptionraw: This character gains 6 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123041]</color> and $[K53]: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S23046]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: This character gains 6 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Searing Blast</color>.
skills.description: This character gains 6 stacks of Armored Crab Carapace and Prepare Skill: Searing Blast.

skills.name: Imperial Panoply
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When combat begins:</color> Gain 5 initial <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123041]</color> stacks.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your side performs any action:</color> If your side has any $[K6] Status or $[K6] Combat Status other than $[C123041], these other effects will be canceled. For each effect canceled, this character gains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123041]</color> stacks.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When combat begins:</color> Gain 5 initial <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color> stacks.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your side performs any action:</color> If your side has any {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> Status or {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> Combat Status other than Armored Crab Carapace, these other effects will be canceled. For each effect canceled, this character gains 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color> stacks.
skills.description:
(Passive) When combat begins: Gain 5 initial Armored Crab Carapace stacks.
After your side performs any action: If your side has any Shield Status or Shield Combat Status other than Armored Crab Carapace, these other effects will be canceled. For each effect canceled, this character gains 2 Armored Crab Carapace stacks.

skills.name: Searing Blast
skills.descriptionraw: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 2 $[K5] to all opposing standby characters. This skill deals +1 $[K103] for every 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123041]</color> stacks this character has.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>, deals 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing standby characters. This skill deals +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> for every 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color> stacks this character has.
skills.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 1 Pyro DMG, deals 2 Piercing DMG to all opposing standby characters. This skill deals +1 Pyro DMG for every 2 Armored Crab Carapace stacks this character has.
